Title: Albinism
Content: :ibox:The pedigree chart traces the appearance of albinism in several generations of a family. One set of parents are labeled 1 and 2. The letter combinations underneath some of the individuals indicate their genetic makeup.

:ibox:Individuals with albinism produce less melanin than individuals without albinism. Melanin is a pigment made by the human body that is responsible for a person's skin tone, eye color, and hair color.
